detail_desc: Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and elastication and a wide flounce around the neckline. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist. Unlined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a boat neck, dropped shoulders with decorative buttons, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neckline and concealed zip at the back. Short, flounced, raglan sleeves, a seam at the waist, and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Calf-length trousers in jersey. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, flap front pockets and gathered 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.
Leggings in stretch fabric. High waist with concealed elastication and legs with sewn-in creases at the front and raw-edge hems.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch flexible denim with a high comfort factor. Hard-worn details that are patched on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif. Bottoms with an all-over print and elasticated waist.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and raw-edge hems with sewn-on lace trims.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with earflaps and ties under the chin.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 2x-12xY), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Fine-knit gloves.
V-neck jumpsuit in jersey with a slight sheen. Opening and button at the back of the neck, seam at the waist, pockets in the side seams and slightly wider straight legs.
Dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with short frilled sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt.
Mesh-knit trainers with imitation leather details, a soft, stretchy edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Umbrella with a telescopic handle and matching cover. Length 23 cm folded.
Cropped top in a patterned viscose weave with short sleeves and deep V-neck with gathers at the front. Concealed zip in one side.
V-neck body in ribbed jersey with narrow tie-top shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and fake welt pockets at the back. Legs with creases and covered elastication at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft pile with trims around the opening and pockets. Stand up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, kangaroo pockets and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable fasteners at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirts in soft jersey made from a cotton and silk blend with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Jumper in a cable knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Padded nylon jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a high waist, zip fly, patch front pockets, fake flap back pockets and gently tapered legs.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Ankle-length trousers in an airy, patterned viscose weave. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim, sewn-on bow and tassels. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Double-layered hat in soft, printed jersey.
V-neck top in sequined mesh with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Calf-length, fitted slip dress in jersey with a sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a slit in one side. Unlined.
Metal watch with a sparkly stone-trimmed face and narrow adjustable strap with a metal buckle. Width of strap 1.5 cm, total length 21 cm. Diameter of watch 2.5 cm.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and zip at the back.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides with satin ribbon ties and a string back.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with gathered elastication and overlocked edges around the neckline and armholes. Seam at the waist with covered elastication, and short legs with elasticated hems.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and wide elastication at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey.
Straight-cut top in a sturdy, textured weave with short sleeves and rows of fringing.
Tailored trousers in a stretch weave with two press-studs at the waist and a zip fly. Zipped front pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim, straight legs.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, block heels and a zip in the side. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx 7.5 cm.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Baby Exclusive. Rib-knit hat in soft wool.
Top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder. Slightly longer at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Hats in soft organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Three-strand thin metal chain necklace with pendants. Adjustable length, 32-40 cm.
Jumper in fine-knit, fluffy yarn. Hood with sewn-on ears and patch front pockets with embroidered details. Ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Hairband in jersey with a sewn-on knot-detail at the front.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.
Short, fitted, halterneck dress in sturdy jersey with decorative buttons down the front.
Cycling shorts in ribbed jersey. High waist with covered elastication.
Cap in patterned cotton jersey with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short top in airy, crinkled jersey with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Narrow, covered elastication and a tie detail at the hem.
Wide shirt in patterned satin with notch lapels, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide cuffs. Contrasting colour trims and slits in the sides.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Pyjama vest top and shorts in soft, jacquard-weave viscose. Top with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft, patterned jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a braided trim at the top. Double layer at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in soft viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a deep, wrapover V-neck at the back, short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Tube scarves in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Width 34 cm, circumference approx. 50 cm.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with lapped shoulders and shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
2-piece set with a longer sweatshirt and matching leggings in a cotton blend. Printed sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Patterned leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Jumpsuit in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and contrasting colour details. Zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish, shawl collar and no buttons.

Ultralight running jacket in fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with a hood with a small collar and narrow elastication around the edge. Zip down the front, chest pocket with a concealed zip and long sleeves with ventilating mesh sections under the arms and thumbholes at the cuffs. Back in ventilating mesh, flatlock seams and reflective details. Rounded, slightly longer hem at the back. Unlined. Weight is 226 g in size M.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
